message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.CY. 

The paper discusses a platform that combines ideas and capabilities from both Big Data and Active Data, and extends an existing open-source Big Data Management System, Apache AsterixDB, with an active toolkit. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.DB (Databases) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also mentions the ability to support retrospective analyses of historical information, which falls under the sub-category cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper discusses features to manage scaled user data subscriptions and actively monitor the state of the data to produce individualized information for each user, which could fall under the sub-categories cs.SE (Software Engineering) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
